      (package private) static char[] HEX_CHARS 
      (package private) static int[] sHexValues
      Lookup table for the first 128 Unicode characters (7-bit ascii) range.
      (package private) static int[] sInputCodes
      Lookup table used for determining which input characters need special handling when contained in text segment.
      (package private) static int[] sInputCodesComment
      Decoding table used to quickly determine characters that are relevant within comment content
      (package private) static int[] sInputCodesJsNames
      To support non-default (and -standard) unquoted field names mode, need to have alternate checking.
      (package private) static int[] sInputCodesUtf8
      Additionally we can combine UTF-8 decoding info into similar data table.
      (package private) static int[] sInputCodesUtf8JsNames
      This table is similar to Latin1, except that it marks all "high-bit" code as ok.
      (package private) static int[] sOutputEscapes
      Lookup table used for determining which output characters need to be quoted.

    • Field Detail

      • HEX_CHARS

        static final char[] HEX_CHARS

      • sInputCodes

        static final int[] sInputCodes
        Lookup table used for determining which input characters need special handling when contained in text segment.

      • sInputCodesUtf8

        static final int[] sInputCodesUtf8
        Additionally we can combine UTF-8 decoding info into similar data table.

      • sInputCodesJsNames

        static final int[] sInputCodesJsNames
        To support non-default (and -standard) unquoted field names mode, need to have alternate checking. Basically this is list of 8-bit ascii characters that are legal as part of Javascript identifier
        Since:
        1.2

      • sInputCodesUtf8JsNames

        static final int[] sInputCodesUtf8JsNames
        This table is similar to Latin1, except that it marks all "high-bit" code as ok. They will be validated at a later point, when decoding name

      • sInputCodesComment

        static final int[] sInputCodesComment
        Decoding table used to quickly determine characters that are relevant within comment content

      • sOutputEscapes

        static final int[] sOutputEscapes
        Lookup table used for determining which output characters need to be quoted.

      • sHexValues

        static final int[] sHexValues
        Lookup table for the first 128 Unicode characters (7-bit ascii) range. For actual hex digits, contains corresponding value; for others -1.
